1.content:
Before we begin let's meet the people:

John Larson: 16, blonde hair green eyes. Normal height and weight. Unofficial leader of the castaways (though not without opposition) he tries to keep the good of the group in mind. Rachel is his sister and Gina his girlfriend.

Hector Tompson: 16, black hair brown eyes. Very tall and thin. He is shy and removed, mostly keeping to himself. He has feelings for Clarisse but has told no one (though Sarah knows.).

Alex Kernst: 16 brown hair blue eyes. A lanky athlete, he is also very smart. He doesn't like John taking charge on the island, although he plans to learn survival before voicing these opinions. Clarisse is his sister.

Rodger Sumner: 16, red hair gray eyes. He is their primary scource of survival knowledge. He works with John as he respects John's nerve to take a leadership role. He is dating Rachel, though for only a short time. She tries to get Rodger as the leader. Gina is his cousin.

Gina Franks: 16, black hair, hazel eyes. John's girlfriend and Rodger's cousin. She supports both of them on the island. She is rather clever and can create new tools that even Rodger could not.

Clarisse Kernst: 15, brown hair blue eyes. Alex's sister. She likes Hector but is unsure if he likes her back (which he does.) She knows basic survivalism and learns fast from Rodger.

Sarah Rienbeck: 15, blonde hair blue eyes. Hector's confidant and Alex's closest friend on the island. She struggles to learn survival which she had no exposure to before.

Rachel Lawerson: 15, brown hair blue eyes. John's sister and dating Rodger. She hates taking orders from her brother and tries to get Rodger in charge, the last place he wants to be.

Kylie Hearn: 15, red hair blue eyes. She knows Gina and Hector but none of the others. She is very independent and keeps to herself.

Who will you follow?
1.title: The people

13.content:
Alex was walking along what looked like a path. John had said that they needed to find a supply of water and that Alex was the man for the job. At least Sarah had gone with him, mostly to cool his temper. Only now he couldn't see her.
"Sarah" he called hoping to hear something. He heard an answer off in the distance. It came from...
13.title: Alex Kernst

choices: They wake up the same in a different place
They are different in the same place.
131.content: Sarah stood in the middle of a field of flowers. Some of the flowers reached up Alex's neck as he waded in. He saw Sarah looking at a bizarre flower, bright yellow and pink. The feint smell of roses was coming from it. The smell lulled Alex to drowsiness, as he found the smell of roses euphoric. A terrible thirst over came him as he stared at the flower. Only when Sarah moved did he notice the golden colored sap dripping from the flower. Sarah got some on her finger and tasted it. She clearly liked it as she started drinking right from the flower. Alex's thirst overcame him and he too started drinking from the sap. Its taste was beyond words. After he started he couldn't stop until his thirst was satisfied. Out of the corner of his eye he saw Sarah fall to the ground. It was then that he noticed his own drowsiness and he laid down on the soft flowers to sleep.
131.title: The flowers

1311.content:
When Alex woke up it felt he had slept for a year. It toke a second or two before he figured out that he was in a different place than before. Sarah was waking up next to him.
"Ugh, where are we?" She asked.
Alex looked around. They were still in a flower field, only now it was all the strange yellow and pink flowers. The field went on as far as the eye could see, nothing else was visible but the flowers. He looked at the flower next to them, the one they drank from. Alex noticed that they mostly drank from the
1311.title: They wake up the same in a different place

13111.content:
Alex touched the yellow petal that he had drank from. It was a strange feeling flower that he couldn't put into words. Sarah was also feeling a yellow petal. "How did this happen, who moved us here." she asked.
Alex had no answer but he felt a strange feeling in his stomach. The world spun as he fell to his knees.
13111.title: Yellow petals

131111.content:
Alex held himself from falling on his back. He had no idea where up was and he felt like he was falling no matter what he did. Then as suddenly as it had come it passed. Alex found that he was laying on his side looking up. He sat up but everything felt strange as he did. He turned to Sarah and was dumbstruck. Sarah's blonde hair had turned a bright gold color and had grown down to her waist. Her eyes had become become pink in color and seemed to almost glitter. Although she still looked her age, she was only four feet tall. She was wearing a white dress that looked like some unrecognizable cloth. After taking this in for a second he remembered the strange feelings he had when he moved. He looked at himself and nearly fainted again. He looked just like Sarah did; four feet tall, golden hair down to the waist, pink sparkling eyes and a white dress. He had a girls body. When he spoke his voice was female, but also sweet and almost musical.
"What are we?" he/she asked.
"I think we're pixies."
131111.title: Fast change

13112.content: Alex had drunk the sap coming from the pink petal only. He was in the midst of wondering why this was important when he glanced at Sarah. He was taken back by her beauty, the way her hair fell around her neck, the way the light caught her eyes, was beyond words. Alex had never noticed it before but Sarah was the most beautiful person he had ever seen. He felt his heart grow heavy at the sight of her. He knew now that he loved Sarah, and had for years. He only hoped that she felt the same way. She turned to him after looking up from the flower, the petal she had been drinking from.
13112.title: Pink petals

132.content:
Alex followed the path down into a cave. After a short passage the cave led into a large room. Light came in from a hole in the ceiling. Sarah stood in the middle of the room in front of a large mirror. He came up behind her and looked at the massive sheet of glass. Sarah slowly reached out and touched it, right where reflection's breasts were. Without warning the cave was filled with a bright light. Even before his sight returned, Alex could feel something was wrong. He felt an unnatural weight on his chest. By the time his eyes could see clearly he saw that he did indeed have breasts. He turned to the now flat-chested Sarah.
"What did you do!" he shouted.
"I, I don't know. I just touched the reflection and..." she trailed off.
"Well touch it again. That should work."
She did and nothing happened. After another try words appeared on mirror: Mirror transformations are one-way. Find the opposite mirror on the other side of the island to undo changes.
"Well that's what we need to do then," Sarah said. "This shows a map of the island so we can find the opposite mirror."
Alex nodded his agreement. As he turned to leave his hand brushed the mirror. Sarah paled as the room began to glow.
132.title: The cave

1322.content:
Alex blinked away spots and happened to notice the bulge in Sarah's pants.
"Great," she said. "Now we both have something that belongs to the other."
"Let's just find the opposite mirror and undo this."
"Right but first there's a problem. My undergarments aren't made for this, equipment. We should probably swap."
Alex reluctantly agreed and they set off to the spot marked on the map as the opposite mirror.
1322.title: His groin

info.brief_description: A group of friends get stranded on a strange island.
info.description:
A group of friends is stranded on a remote island. The island is full of transformation objects of all kinds, from magic mirrors and exotic plants to strange machines and mysterious water.

While this is by no means the main focus, there will be some just normal island survivalism to the story, but TFs are the main thing.

And now for some rules:
1. You can see the rating, keep within those bounds.
2. While some chapters do need to be short choice ones, try to add solid content on most pages.
3. Mental changes are allowed and encouraged, but don't go overboard. If you want to change everything about a charecter, do it slowly over time. Also don't change everyone's minds.
4. Don't kill main charecters. People introduced after the start are expendable. The only exepetion to this rule is if they are dead but still in the story, such as a ghost or a vampire. Not to many monsters though.
5. No zombies, everyone does zombies.
6. Many people forbid turning girls into boys. I say go ahead.

Nothing else really, just follow the rules and be original.
